Package com.yahoo.labs.samoa.instances

Class InstanceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.labs.samoa.instances.InstanceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Instance, MultiLabelInstance, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DenseInstance, MultilabelInstance, SparseInstance

    public class InstanceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements MultiLabelInstance
